DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two multifocal contact lenses presbyopic wearer .
DOC.criteria: At least 35 year age . Sign write Informed Consent Spectacle add +0.50 +2.50D . Best correct visual acuity least 20.30 eye . Currently wear soft contact lenses least 5 day per week . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within twelve week enrollment . Currently enrol clinical trial . Astigmatism > 1.00D . Strabismus/amblyopia . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
